description: This file is a Bash script that overrides the `sass` command to ensure consistent CSS build behavior within CI environments. It provides a shell-level function to handle Sass compilation, attempting to use `npx` if available, or falling back to a custom build script.

methods.name: sass
methods.description: Custom shell function that overrides the default `sass` command to ensure CSS compilation in CI environments, falling back to a build script if necessary.
